name: CustomClickEvent
description: The CustomClickEvent class is a specialized click event that extends Minecraft's ClickEvent to allow custom JavaScript functions to be executed when text components are clicked.
overview: The CustomClickEvent class provides a way to bind JavaScript functions to clickable text in Minecraft. Unlike standard Minecraft click events that are limited to predefined actions like opening URLs or running commands, CustomClickEvent allows you to execute any custom JavaScript code when the text is clicked. This makes it particularly useful for creating interactive chat messages, script-controlled GUI elements, custom command systems, and dynamic HUD elements.

constructors.description: Creates a new CustomClickEvent with a custom JavaScript function to execute when clicked.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The JavaScript function to execute when the text is clicked

methods.name: getEvent
methods.description: Returns the JavaScript function associated with this click event.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this click event, based on the underlying function.
